dpm.lejos.orientation

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • dpm.lejos.orientation.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing every unit tile on the playground board Each tile has 4 sides and measures 30 cm x 30 cm or 1 in x 1 in
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Daniel Macario

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tile()
      Default constructor Makes new tile where all sides are clear and tile is not an obstacle
      Tile(Tile tile)
      Copy Constructor
